title: The underestimated role of major skin commensal Malassezia furfur in the development of neonatal invasive fungal infections
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Tatiana V. Priputnevich, Alexey B. Gordeev, Natalia E. Shabanova, Pavel Denisov, Dmitry Yu Trofimov, Ekaterina N. Balashova, Andrey E. Donnikov, Ekaterina L. Yarotskaya, Viktor V. Zubkov, Gennady T. Sukhikh
